channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Friends and FOMO pushed newbie investors to buy crypto in 2022 — Survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.category: United States Financial Industry Regulatory Authority
item.description: A survey from the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) suggests that new crypto investors tended to be swayed by suggestions from friends, compared to equities or bond investors.

item.title: 2 reasons why Bitcoin Ordinals are ‘positive’ for BTC: Grayscale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Ordinals have been a controversial topic within the Bitcoin community but crypto investment firm Grayscale says there’s two main reasons to be optimistic.

item.title: Gemini ‘supportive’ of Genesis mediation, but frustrated over pacing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Genesis is starting a 30-day meditation with its key creditors as its bankruptcy proceedings are close to hitting the four-month mark.

item.title: Just Bitcoin or diversify? 5 cryptocurrencies to watch in the next few days
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: If Bitcoin price breaks above $30,000, several altcoins such as SOL, ATOM, ICP and HBAR are well-positioned for a rally of their own.

item.title: Mineflation: Cost to mine one Bitcoin in the US rises from $5K to $17K in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: New Mexico is the cheapest US state to mine Bitcoin in terms of average electricity cost, while Hawaii is the by far the most expensive.

item.title: ‘Good luck bears’ — Bitcoin traders closely watch April close with BTC price at $29K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin approaches the end of April having barely moved, with BTC’s price offering little short-term clues on the trajectory.

item.title: YouTube helps recover hacked channel that attempted XRP crypto scams
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: YouTube’s swift intervention ensured damage control by preventing XRP hackers from interacting with the channel’s subscribers.

item.title: First Republic’s crisis is not an isolated incident: JPMorgan exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The chief investment officer of J.P. Morgan Asset Management said it would be “naive to say that this is just limited to First Republic.”

item.title: FDIC pins Signature Bank’s failure on poor governance and illiquidity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The FDIC blamed Signature’s board of directors and management for pursuing “unrestrained growth” using uninsured deposits without implementing liquidity risk management strategies.

item.title: FDIC alleges Cross River engaged in ‘unsafe’ lending practices
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Cross River Bank is yet to confirm or deny the allegations that it “engaged in the unsafe or unsound banking practices” related to its lending activity in 2021.

item.title: Visa stablecoin plan, debt’s ceiling effect on Bitcoin price: Hodler’s Digest, April 23-29
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Circle launches cross-chain transfer protocol, Visa shares plans for stablecoin product, Kraken fights back in court, and more.

item.title: Tencent Cloud to reportedly offer deepfake creation tool at $145
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Tencent Cloud’s deepfake creation service can analyze and train itself on three-minute videos and 100 voice clips to produce a convincing deepfake video within 24 hours.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT reenters Italy after obliging transparency demands
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The revocation of the ban in Italy required ChatGPT to reveal its data processing practices and implement age-gating measures, among other legal requirements.

item.title: Mastercard launches Web3 user verification solution to curb bad actors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Mastercard’s new solution revolves around providing “secure transactions between users, verified according to standards” set by the company.

item.title: Elon Musk introduces Twitter monetization avenues for content creators
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The latest user-centric revamp aims to improve follower engagement and create new revenue streams on the social media platform.

item.title: Rep. McHenry announces hearings to address market structure around crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Representative Patrick McHenry suggested the hearings will look to add to the regulatory efforts being done on the bipartisan bill led by Senators Cynthia Lummis and Kirsten Gillibrand.

item.title: Fed, NYDFS assess their supervisory performance after March’s big bank failures
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Internal reviews of the supervision of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank have been released, showing weaknesses on the part of the banks’ regulators as well as management.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Google bullish on blockchain, UK’s $125M AI pledge, Voyager and Binance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores Google expanding its Web3 program, the U.K.’s $125 AI pledge, FTX selling LedgerX and Binance.US backing out of its Voyager purchase.

item.title: UK Treasury seeks input on taxing DeFi staking and lending: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The UK Treasury is seeking input on taxing the DeFi space, and on provisions around staking and lending.

item.title: Venmo will enable fiat-to-crypto payments in May
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Users of the mobile payment service will also be able to receive crypto through a QR code or external crypto address.

item.title: Tax law researchers propose IRS framework for deducting crypto losses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A recently published study appears to advocate for the isolation of crypto assets from other tax deductions where losses are concerned.

item.title: How would a US debt default impact Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how a U.S. debt default could impact Bitcoin and the larger cryptocurrency market.

item.title: What is Auto-GPT, and why does it matter?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tayyub Yaqoob
item.description: Auto-GPT is a powerful tool for task automation that combines natural language processing and deep learning to generate human-like text responses.

item.title: Cointelegraph accelerator program welcomes Brickken: A new step in asset tokenization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: By participating in Cointelegraph’s Accelerator Program, Brickken aims to support companies through the entire tokenization cycle.

item.title: Mauritius planning to launch pilot project for retail digital rupee late this year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The governor of the Bank of Mauritius told a meeting of central bank technologists about the development of the island nation’s CBDC ambitions.

item.title: Price analysis 4/28: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins continue to face selling at higher levels, a sign that the bears have not yet given up.

item.title: Bitcoin price holds $29K as US PCE data sparks 90% Fed rate hike bets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin holds firm around $29,000 as markets escape a “shock” from the week’s main macro event.

item.title: Crypto Stories: Tim Draper tells how his family moved into Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Billionaire venture capitalist Tim Draper made a turn in his family’s path to Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Where crypto can grow: Digital asset regulations around the world
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: While many countries have sped up their efforts to regulate cryptocurrencies following a crisis-filled 2022, most still lack a clear framework for the industry to build around.

item.title: Google Cloud to optimize Polygon zkEVM scaling performance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Polygon Labs and Google Cloud will team up in a multi-year agreement to drive the development and adoption of the Ethereum scaling protocol’s infrastructure and developer tools.
